name: Push the Blob
description:
Push the Blob to the openings.

CONTROLS: arrow keys/ Left Control stick on game pad/W = up, S = down. A =left, D= right. Escape key = Main Menu.  Game is done when all blobs are gone.

Assets are from GamePlusJames Action RPG course, and Game Jams Quick Menu from his itch.io page.

ENJOY!

UPDATE: 

fixed some game breaking bugs, and got All the files uploaded this time!
